headline: How New Catalysts Are Shifting the Narrative for Halliburton
summary: Halliburton’s narrative is shifting as fresh research pushes its fair value estimate slightly higher to about $30.38 per share, supported by a small reduction in the discount rate to roughly 7.65 % and a marginal uptick in long term revenue growth to around 1.60 %. These tweaks reflect growing confidence that stronger than expected Q3 execution, improved capital efficiency and emerging power generation opportunities can support a higher price target even as some analysts remain cautious on...
